rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming area with traditional Kerala-style door, murals, and decorative motifs.

rooms.name: Courtyard
rooms.description: Central open space featuring traditional stone or tiled flooring with a fountain. Designed as per Vastu principles for energy flow; serves as family gathering spot.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious room facing the courtyard, decorated with wood paneling and traditional artifacts.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room with a Kerala-style dining table set-up.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional area designed with local materials, equipped for joint family usage; features open cooking space with ventilation adhering to Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Privacy oriented bedroom with adjoining bathroom and closet. Decorated with Kerala motifs and natural light from openings facing east or north, avoiding direct west exposure due to Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Guest Bedrooms
rooms.description: Separate rooms with private bathrooms for guests, designed with adequate ventilation and light.

rooms.name: Family Room
rooms.description: Multi-purpose space for the joint family gatherings, possibly a small study area integrated with traditional Kerala design elements.

openings.description: Traditional wooden door crafted in local style, ensuring smooth flow of positive energy.
Large windows providing ample natural light while minimizing direct exposure from the west per Vastu principles.
Covered walkway leading to the courtyard, blending indoor-outdoor spaces.

rooms.name: Study/Library
rooms.description: A dedicated quiet space with bookshelves and Kerala style wooden workstations, designed to encourage learning while keeping Vastu principles in mind by positioning near the east for positive energy.

rooms.name: Additional Bedrooms
rooms.description: Extra bedroom for extended family members or guests, equipped with personal bathroom.

openings.description: Transition area leading to the rooftop terrace providing views and ventilation.
Windows oriented for optimal natural lighting, adhering to Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: A serene outdoor space with seating areas and traditional Kerala style pergolas. Serves as a communal relaxation area for the joint family, aligning with Vastu's emphasis on harmony.

openings.description: A secure staircase designed in traditional style with handrails.
